title: JEDI Outreach Group
text:
The Justice, Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion (JEDI) Outreach Group, a community of statisticians and data scientists, is committed to communication, programming, and professional development to advance and support a society that values all people.
JEDI is an outreach group of the American Statistical Association.
Complete this form to become a member.

title: JEDI Outreach Group
text: The Justice, Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion (JEDI) Outreach Group, a community of statisticians and data scientists, is committed to communication, programming, and professional development to advance and support a society that values all people.

title: History
text:
In particular: "The American Statistical Association has established the Justice, Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion (JEDI) Outreach Group to develop a diverse and inclusive environment that embraces all statisticians and data scientists, as well as to study and address statistical methods that can potentially introduce or exacerbate inequities and injustices in our society. Accordingly, we are committed to communication, programming, and professional development to advance and support a society that values all people."






Note

title: Resources
text:
Statistics without Borders https://www.statisticswithoutborders.org/ 
Caucus for Women in Statistics https://cwstat.org/ 

Links to resources:

https://labs.icahn.mssm.edu/bennlab/antiracism-resources/
https://library.osu.edu/researchcommons/2020/06/17  (Web view)
https://medicine-matters.blogs.hopkinsmedicine.org/files/2016  (Web view)
https://www.cdc.gov/healthcommunication/Preferred_Terms.html  (Web view)
Donna and Yates have started to compile resources, could transfer those here

A possible example for the type of resources to share:  See: https://cwstat.org/professional-development-resources/ or https://cwstat.org/publications/cws-library/ (although the formatting could be better for this library)
